text: DeLoris Doederlein (born October 6, 1925) is an American educator and politician. Doederlein graduated from Valparaiso University and National Louis University. She taught school and lived in East Dundee, Illinois with her husband and family. Doedelein served in the Illinois House of Representatives, from 1987 to 1993 and was involved with the Republican Party.'Illinois Blue Book 1991-1992,' Biographical Sketch of DeLoris Doederlein, pg. 100'At 90, East Dundee resident Deloris Doederlein working on bucket list,' Elgin Courier News, Erin Sander, October 6, 2015'Octogenarian calls East Dundee "her beloved hometown,"' The Daily Herald, Brian Hill, October 10, 2014 ==Notes== Category:1925 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kane County, Illinois Category:Valparaiso University alumni Category:National Louis University alumni Category:Educators from Illinois Category:Illinois Republicans Category:Women state legislators in Illinois Category:Members of the Illinois House of Representatives
title: DeLoris Doederlein
